::Savanna::

She saw HotRod out of hte corner of her eye.  She turned her head 
slightly, "HotRod, I would appreciate it if you would not fire at 
this bot while I am hanging ontothe front of him trying to talk. 
Thank you." She turned her head back to the leader bot. "Now, please 
answer me, what porpose do you have with the Ark?" She hung onto his 
chest armor with her claws still staying eye to eye with this rather 
large bot.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod continued to walk quietly. He was trying to waver there
> attention from the Ark, when he said that there was nobody there.
> The more he thought, the more he felt stupid. He was surprized, he 
would
> have never made that mistake, if he had a Matrix. All this made him 
wish
> the Maximal Matrix within him, would refill, and he would become 
Rodimus
> Prime. At least he had enough smarts to be a warrior then.
> He then decided to take action. He walked in front of the Bount 
Hunters,
> pointing his plasma guns at them.
> "You're not going any farther, without meeting you're maker."
